Sentencas: Ammonia is a promising carbon-free hydrogen carrier.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: Owing to their nickel-rich anodes and high operating temperatures, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can directly utilize NH3 fuel-direct-ammonia SOFCs (DA-SOFCs).
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: Lowering the operating temperature can diversify application areas of DA-SOFCs.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: We tested direct-ammonia operation using two types of thin-film SOFCs (TF-SOFCs) under 500 to 650 degrees C and compared these with a conventional SOFC.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: The TF-SOFC with a nickel oxide gadolinium-doped ceria anode achieved a peak power density of 1330 mW cm(-2) (NH3 fuel under 650 degrees C), which is the best performance reported to date.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: However, the performance difference between the NH3 and H-2 operations was significant.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance analyses, ammonia conversion quantification, and two-dimensional multi-physics modeling suggested that reduced ammonia conversion at low temperatures is the main cause of the performance gap.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects

Sentencas: A comparative study with previously reported DA-SOFCs clarified that incorporating a more active ammonia decomposition catalyst will further improve low-temperature DA-SOFCs.
Titulo: A comprehensive investigation of direct ammonia- fueled thin-film solid-oxide fuel cells: Performance, limitation, and prospects
